data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Sporting's Pedro Porro breaks free at Estadio Municipal de Portimao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 1, Goal kick for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Ball safe as Sporting is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 3, Portimonense drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Portimonense's Beto gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 4, It's a goal kick for the away team in Portimao.
Sporting take a 0-1 lead thanks to Nuno Mendes.
Fabricio (Portimonense) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Manuel Oliveira.
In the minute 7, Portimonense's Fali Cande is on target but unsuccessful.
Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portimonense's half?
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 9, In Portimao a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Luciano Vietto (Sporting) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in Portimonense.
In the minute 11, Goal! Nuno Santos extends Sporting lead to 0-2 with a header.
That's a fine assist from Luciano Vietto.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 13, Manuel Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Sporting goal kick.
Corner awarded to Portimonense.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Portimonense are caught offside.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 18, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Portimonense.
Manuel Oliveira signals a Sporting throw-in in Portimonense's half.
In the minute 19, Sporting to take a throw-in in Portimonense territory.
Sebastian Coates of Sporting smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Manuel Oliveira.
In the minute 20, Sporting surge into the attack at Estadio Municipal de Portimao but Sebastian Coatesâ€™s header is off-target.
Manuel Oliveira awards Portimonense a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Portimonense have a goal kick.
Welinton Junior is replacing Lucas for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Sporting.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Sporting in the half of Portimonense.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Sporting.
Throw-in for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
In the minute 26, At Estadio Municipal de Portimao, Sporting are penalized for being offside.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Portimonense.
In Portimao a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 28, Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sporting's half?
In Portimao Sporting attack through Luciano Vietto. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
In the minute 30, Portimonense to take a throw-in in Sporting territory.
Free kick Portimonense.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 32, Sporting awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Welinton Junior for Portimonense gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Manuel Oliveira awards Sporting a goal kick.
In the minute 34, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Portimonense in their own half.
In Portimao, Portimonense push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Portimonense.
Throw-in Portimonense.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Portimonense in their own half.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
Portimonense are pushing forward but Fali Cande's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 39, It's a goal kick for the away team in Portimao.
Manuel Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
In Portimao, Fabricio (Portimonense) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 40, Sporting have a goal kick.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Lucas Fernandes for Portimonense has been booked by Manuel Oliveira and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Portimonense in the half of Sporting.
Corner awarded to Portimonense.
Portimonense pushes forward through Willyan Rocha, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 44, Ball goes out of play for a Sporting goal kick.
Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Sporting at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
In the minute 45, Beto for Portimonense drives towards goal at Estadio Municipal de Portimao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Manuel Oliveira will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Manuel Oliveira signals a Portimonense throw-in in Sporting's half.
In the minute 45, Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Portimonense.
Can Portimonense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sporting's half?
Portimonense to take a throw-in in Sporting territory.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Sporting is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The first-half is over at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
The second half has started at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
In the minute 46, Free kick Portimonense.
In Portimao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sporting's Sebastian Coates has been booked in Portimao.
In the minute 47, Goal kick for Sporting at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Throw-in for Sporting in their own half.
Manuel Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Portimonense.
Throw-in Sporting.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 51, Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Manuel Oliveira.
Manuel Oliveira signals a Portimonense throw-in in Sporting's half.
In the minute 52, Portimonense's Willyan Rocha is back in action after a slight knock.
Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sporting's half?
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Willyan Rocha for Portimonense who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Attention is being given to Sportingâ€™s Nuno Mendes and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 54, Nuno Mendes for Sporting is back on the field again.
Sporting have a goal kick.
Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 55, Portimonense are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Free kick for Portimonense in the half of Sporting.
The away team replace Nuno Santos with Daniel Braganca.
In the minute 57, Portimonense are coming forward and Fabricio gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Manuel Oliveira awards Sporting a goal kick.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Sporting.
In the minute 60, Sporting's Luciano Vietto gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Portimonense defender.
Corner awarded to Sporting.
Ball goes out of play for a Portimonense goal kick.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Portimonense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 62, Paulo Sergio (Portimonense) is making a second substitution, with Ricardo Vaz Te replacing Beto.
Anderson de Oliveira da Silva is on a sub for Aylton Boa Morte for Portimonense.
Ruben Amorim is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Municipal de Portimao with Goncalo Inacio replacing Zouhair Feddal.
In the minute 63, Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Portimonense.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Portimao.
Ball safe as Sporting is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 65, Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portimonense's half?
Sporting's Daniel Braganca is whistled for offside at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
In the minute 67, Manuel Oliveira signals a throw-in for Portimonense, close to Sporting's area.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 69, Sporting have a goal kick.
Manuel Oliveira signals a Portimonense throw-in in Sporting's half.
Important block from the Sporting defence as Fabricio fires in a strike for Portimonense.
In the minute 70, Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Manuel Oliveira.
Fabricio (Portimonense) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sporting goal kick.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Sporting at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
The away team have replaced Nuno Mendes with Vitorino Antunes. This is the third substitution made today by Ruben Amorim.
Gonzalo Plata is replacing Luciano Vietto for Sporting at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
In the minute 71, Ruben Amorim (Sporting) is making a fifth substitution, with Bruno Tabata replacing Tiago Tomas.
Pedro Porro for Sporting gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Manuel Oliveira awards Portimonense a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniel Braganca of Sporting gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Portimao.
In the minute 74, Sporting awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Portimonense in the half of Sporting.
In Portimao Portimonense drive forward through Ricardo Vaz Te. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 77, In Portimao a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Portimonense make their fourth substitution with Henrique Gelain replacing Fali Cande.
Sporting's Pedro Porro misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Sporting.
Free kick Portimonense.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Sporting in the half of Portimonense.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
Portimonense are whistled for offside.
In the minute 84, Sporting to take a throw-in in Portimonense territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sporting to take a throw-in in Portimonense territory.
In the minute 86, Portimonense have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Portimonense in their own half.
Sporting's Bruno Tabata gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Municipal de Portimao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 87, Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Sporting at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
In Portimao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Manuel Oliveira signals a Sporting throw-in in Portimonense's half.
Corner awarded to Portimonense.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Portimonense's Welinton Junior breaks free at Estadio Municipal de Portimao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Portimao.
Throw-in Portimonense.
Manuel Oliveira awards Sporting a goal kick.
Portimonense advance rapidly upfield but Manuel Oliveira blows for offside.
Free kick Sporting.
Ball goes out of play for a Portimonense goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 0-2.
